mapper.select: SELECT l.id, l.title, l.content, l.inserted, l.updated, u.nickname, COUNT(r.id) replyCount FROM tb_board_life l JOIN tb_user u ON l.memberId = u.id LEFT JOIN tb_reply_life r ON l.id = r.boardId WHERE content like concat('%',#{search},'%' ) GROUP BY l.id ORDER BY l.id DESC
SELECT id, postId, fileName, url, isThumbnail FROM tb_file_life WHERE postId =#{boardId}

SELECT p.id, p.memberId, p.location, (SELECT count(postId) FROM tb_board_life_up WHERE postId = p.id) up, p.views, p.tag, p.title, p.content, p.inserted, p.updated, m.nickname, COUNT(r.id) replyCount, (SELECT lu.userId FROM tb_board_life_up lu WHERE lu.userId = #{loginId} AND lu.postId=p.id) upposession FROM tb_board_life p JOIN tb_user m ON m.id = p.memberId LEFT JOIN tb_reply_life r ON p.id = r.boardId
GROUP BY p.id Order By p.id DESC;

SELECT p.id, p.memberId, p.location, (SELECT count(postId) FROM tb_board_life_up WHERE postId = p.id) up, p.views, p.tag, p.title, p.content, p.inserted, p.updated, m.nickname, COUNT(r.id) replyCount, (SELECT hu.userId FROM tb_board_life_up hu WHERE hu.userId = #{loginId} AND hu.postId=p.id) upposession FROM tb_board_life p JOIN tb_user m ON m.id = p.memberId LEFT JOIN tb_reply_life r ON p.id = r.boardId
WHERE p.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_board_life (memberId, location, tag, title, content) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{location}, #{tag}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_board_life SET tag = #{tag}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tb_board_life SET views = views +1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, postId, fileName, COUNT(postId) countpostId FROM tb_file_life GROUP BY postId;
SELECT id, postId, fileName, COUNT(postId) countpostId FROM tb_file_life WHERE postId=#{id} GROUP BY postId;
